Description

Handles all basic Discuss request handling within the forums.

output
jump to class

output( string $output, array $properties = array ) : string

Output the final forum output and wrap in the disWrapper chunk, if in debug mode. The wrapper code will need to be in the Template if not in debug mode.

Arguments
$output
string
The output to process
$properties
array
Output
string
The final wrapped output, or blank if not in debug.
